{{tag.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from 'src/app/service/food.service'; import { Tag } from 'src/app/sheard/models/tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent { tags?:Tag[] constructor(foodService:FoodService){ this.tags = foodService.getAllTags() } }
